conbody.p: Nowadays, there are many web applications rendering elements in an iframe. Therefore, you have to tell your script how to traverse a website's iframes and select the correct iframe where the text and its object are present. To do so, you have to use the Switch To Frame keyword before interacting with the elements.
supports an ability to define parent iframe object within the test object view, so you only need to select the parent iframe, and the execution automatically switches to that iframe.
